SCTX - Script Source:
scn fbmwBMWerewolfVideoPC
short isnotfirsttransf

Begin Function{}
	set isnotfirsttransf to fbmwBMAAAImAWere.isnotfirsttransf
	;Recontrol. Altrought is almost impossible  that for now PCs can contract lycantropy on wilderness as werewolf, as they encounters are not implemented yet it may be possible on a future version 
	;Num me convince
	if(isnotfirsttransf == 0)
		PlayBink "bm_werewolf1.bik"
		set fbmwBMAAAImAWere.isnotfirsttransf to 1
	elseif(isnotfirsttransf == 1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMCeremony2 < 10)&&(GetStage fbmwBMCeremony1 < 10)
		PlayBink "bm_ceremony1.bik"
		SetStage fbmwBMCeremony2 10
	elseif(isnotfirsttransf == 1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMCeremony2 == 50)
		PlayBink "bm_ceremony2.bik"
		set fbmwbmclawcost to 35;Sharpen claws
		SetStage fbmwBMCeremony2 100
	elseif(isnotfirsttransf == 1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMCeremony2 == 100)&&(GetStage fbmwBMBearHunt2 < 1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMBearHunt1 < 10)
		PlayBink "bm_bearhunt1.bik"
		SetStage fbmwBMBearHunt2 10
	elseif(isnotfirsttransf == 1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMBearHunt2 == 50)
		PlayBink "bm_bearhunt2.bik"
		SetStage fbmwBMBearHunt2 100
		Player.AddSpell 0bmUsummonbonewolf
	elseif(isnotfirsttransf == 1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMBearHunt2 >=100)&&(GetStage fbmwBMFrostGiant2 <=1)&&(GetStage fbmwBMFrostGiant1 < 10)
		PlayBink "bm_frostgiant1.bik"
		SetStage fbmwBMFrostGiant2 10
	elseif(GetStage fbmwBMFrostGiant2 == 70)
		PlayBink "bm_frostgiant2.bik"
		Player.AddSpell 0bmUhunterwind
		SetStage fbmwBMFrostGiant2 100
	elseif(GetStage fbmwBMFrostGiant2 == 100)&&(GetStage fbmwBMWildHunt <= 10)
		PlayBink "bm_wereend.bik"
		set fbmwBMWildHunt.begin to 4
		SetStage fbmwBMWildHunt 25
		Player.Call fbmwMoveToFunct fbmwbmWildHuntTeleMarker
	else
		PlayBink "bm_werewolf2.bik"ì
	endif

End
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 295 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
